metadata.title: RHSA-2024:0992: rh-postgresql10-postgresql security update (Important)
metadata.description:
PostgreSQL is an advanced object-relational database management system (DBMS).

Security Fix(es):

* postgresql: non-owner 'REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW CONCURRENTLY' executes arbitrary SQL (CVE-2024-0985)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: postgresql: non-owner 'REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW CONCURRENTLY' executes arbitrary SQL
